original_text: Then shall they cry unto the Lord, but he will not hear them: he will even hide his face from them at that time, as they have behaved themselves ill in their doings.
korean_text: 그 때에 그들이 여호와께 부르짖을지라도 응답하지 아니하시고 그들의 행위가 악했던 만큼 그들 앞에 얼굴을 가리시리라

sentences.original_text: Then shall they cry unto the Lord
but he will not hear them
he will even hide his face from them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게서 자기 얼굴을 숨기실 것이라

sentences.original_text: as they have behaved themselves ill in their doings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 행위로 악하게 행하였음으로 말미암음이라
